description: This file defines a React functional component 'DeviceDetail' that displays detailed information about a specific device, including its attributes and configured protocols. It handles data fetching, error handling, and user interactions such as delete and edit operations.

methods.name: loadDevice
methods.description: Fetches device data from the server using deviceService.getDevice and updates component state.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles device deletion after user confirmation, calls deviceService.deleteDevice, and navigates back to device list.

ctags.name: status === 'inactive' ? 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800' : 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800' }
ctags.scope: DeviceDetail.className.px-2 py-1 text-xs font-medium rounded-full ${ device.status === 'active' ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-800' : device

fields.scope: DeviceDetail.className.px-2 py-1 text-xs font-medium rounded-full ${ device.status === 'active' ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-800' : device
